basics.name: David Lozano Jarque
basics.label: Full stack software engineer: from scratch to production
basics.summary: Turning ideas into code is my passion: I've been developing software since I was in elementary school. First as a hobby, then as a freelance, and eventually in a company. Overall, my mission is to provide valuable contributions to great projects that can make a difference in their users' lifes

work.name: Open-sourcing & freelancing
work.summary: Took a planned break from corporate work to focus on deepening technical knowledge in areas previously limited by time constraints during full-time roles. Explored topics such as semantic release, in-depth Angular, JavaScript/Typescript bundling optimizations and the maintenance of open source (npm) libraries. Complemented technical growth with learning on team culture and engineering management, reading several key books on leadership and collaboration.
highlights: Created an open-source library for Angular for managing meta tags: [@davidlj95/ngx-meta](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@davidlj95/ngx-meta)
Built a [fashion stylist portfolio](https://christianlazaro.es) featuring optimized responsive images delivery

Contributed to open source projects through many [pull requests](https://github.com/pulls?q=author%3A%40me+-user%3A%40me+created%3A%3E2023-05-15) and [issues](https://github.com/search?q=is%3Aissue+author%3Adavidlj95+-user%3Adavidlj95&type=issues&s=created&o=desc). Plus other kinds of [public contributions](https://www.notion.so/davidlj95/9f766c2fe57e4a9ebf0bc571b62ec446?v=9db04a3147ec4323883403873a13c05d&pvs=4)
Designed and launched a [personal website](https://davidlj95.com) on the internet

work.name: Vesto
work.summary: Backend: web APIs and background processing. Led, engineered and assisted many product features. Proposed and implemented a strategy to improve app stability by reducing error rates. Focused on enhancing observability to enable for data-driven decision-making. Optimized internal processes to reduce customer support workload
highlights: Led initiative that reduced wallet synchronization issues from 69% to 6%
Developed direct batch buy feature to allow purchasing multiple stocks at once
Authored several backend and company-wide initiatives—e.g., promoting technical refinements, distinguishing bugs from complaints, and tracking estimation accuracy
Introduced 'Learning Fridays' to foster knowledge sharing within the engineering team
Integrated New Relic to improve system observability and monitoring

work.name: Koa Health
work.summary: Full stack: web APIs backend, web and mobile app. Led, developed and supported several product features. Worked cross-functionally with product, design, QA, DevOps, cybersecurity, research and other products teams. Enhanced the company's design system library
highlights: Joined as mid-level engineer; promoted to senior after first year's performance review
Led development of key features such as audio exercises and push notifications in the mobile app and messaging in both web and mobile apps for the Mindset product
Maintained backend infrastructure in collaboration with the DevOps team
Developed and maintain many authZ/N features. Created a proof of concept for Single Sign-On (SSO) using AWS Cognito to federate with third-party identity providers
Managed CI/CD pipelines
Supported company spin-off by automating the setup of new email signatures for all employees

work.name: Telefónica Alpha
work.summary: Belonged to the health moonshot unit, which later spun off into a standalone company. For more details on projects and responsibilities during this period, please refer to the Koa Health entry

work.name: BTC Assessors
work.summary: Full stack: web apps and peer to peer / web API backends. Served as the lead software engineer across all company projects. Acted as blockchain/distributed ledger technologies (DLT) consultant and researcher. Served as a board member in a technical advisor role for a planned in-house cryptocurrency investment fund
highlights: Led multiple software projects, including a Bitcoin library and wallet and a verifiable credentials platform
Provided technical consulting on Bitcoin, blockchain and DLT technologies to clients
Delivered several talks and presentations about Bitcoin and blockchain technologies
Supported project management and delivery across several software initiatives

work.name: SEAT
work.summary: Coordinated integration of IBC Biomechanics software into SEAT's internal IT systems for use in their biomechanical laboratory at the CARS center, located within the Martorell headquarters

work.name: Meditrauma
work.summary: Managed IT systems and infrastructure across all three company branches. Responsible for systems administration and general IT consulting, ensuring smooth operation of hardware, software, and network resources
highlights: Maintained local and wireless area networks of devices, including cybersecurity measures such as traffic filtering
Operated on-premises company servers, including shared file systems (Samba), databases (Microsoft SQL and Borland BDE); ensured regular data backups
Supported and maintained network-connected printers and scanners
Managed workstations, including software installation, endpoint protection, and user permissions
Oversaw hardware and service maintenance for occupational risk prevention and medical devices, such as audiometers, X-ray machines and ECGs

work.name: IBC Biomechanics
work.summary: Developed a reporting application and several proof-of-concept apps for interfacing with biomechanical using Bluetooth. Also managed the IT systems of the company, supporting day-to-day operations
highlights: Automated the reporting process, reducing turnaround time from several hours to just seconds
Developed and tested in-house biomechanical data capture and processing software to eliminate third-party software dependencies and enable a more integrated analysis experience
Managed the company IT infrastructure, including workstations, office software, endpoint protection and data backup systems

awards.title: 2nd place at University degree's gamification program
